tool_description: Analyzes fire risk based on building occupancy type, density, and usage patterns.

occupancy_type.description: Primary occupancy classification (assembly, educational, healthcare, residential, etc.)

mobility_impaired_occupants.description: Number of occupants with mobility limitations

error_messages: Invalid occupancy type: Use standard occupancy classifications (assembly, business, educational, factory, hazardous, institutional, mercantile, residential, storage, utility).
Occupant load error: Must be a positive integer representing realistic building capacity.
Operating hours format error: Use 24-hour format (HH:MM-HH:MM) for each day.
Mobility impaired count error: Cannot exceed total occupant load.
usage: Specify occupancy_type, occupant_load, and operating_hours. Include mobility_impaired_occupants if applicable to assess evacuation challenges.

occupancy_risk_score.description: Risk score from 1-10 based on occupancy factors

high_risk_periods.description: Time periods with elevated risk due to occupancy
